amendment.description: Amendment narrows the definition of the word "incident" to ensure that a cybersecurity incident is limited to actions taken against an information system or information stored on that system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to amend Section 226 of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 by refining the definition of cyber "incident" to explicitly restrict information sharing to incidents that are directly related to protecting information systems.
